response.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><requirements xmlns="http://weblabel.hella-aglaia.com/schema/requirements"><group id="extension-sign-group" name="Sign with extension"><class id="extension-position" name="Position of the extension sign"><value id="position-below" name="Below" /><value id="position-above" name="Above" /></class></group><thing id="legacy" shape="rectangle" name="Time Range Sign"><class id="time-limit-start" name="Start of time limit"><value id="time-limit-start-0" name="0" /></class><class id="time-limit-end" name="End of time limit"><value id="time-limit-end-0" name="0" /></class></thing></requirements>
